description.value: The head circumference is the size of the head as measured around the head.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-HeadCircumference](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-HeadCircumference) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
